name: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), George R.R. Martin (written for television by)
actors: Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington
plot: Jon and the wildlings travel south of The Wall. Talisa tells Robb that she's pregnant. Arya runs away from the Brotherhood. Daenerys arrives at Yunkai. Jamie leaves Brienne behind at Harrenhal.
